definition: indicating the absence of any or all units under consideration, the sight setting that will cause a projectile to hit the center of the target with no wind blowing, adjust, as by firing under test conditions, the zero of a gun
details:
adjective
- indicating the absence of any or all units under consideration
= example: indicating the absence of any or all units under consideration
- indicating an initial point or origin
- of or relating to the null set (a set with no members)
- having no measurable or otherwise determinable value
noun
- the sight setting that will cause a projectile to hit the center of the target with no wind blowing
- the point on a scale from which positive or negative numerical quantities can be measured
= synonyms: zero point
- a quantity of no importance
= synonyms: nothing
- a mathematical element that when added to another number yields the same number
= synonyms: cipher, cypher, nought
verb
- adjust, as by firing under test conditions, the zero of a gun
= example: adjust, as by firing under test conditions, the zero of a gun
= synonyms: zero in
- adjust (an instrument or device) to zero value
